title: LedgerUpgradeType
description:
LedgerUpgradeType is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum LedgerUpgradeType { LEDGER_UPGRADE_VERSION = 1, LEDGER_UPGRADE_BASE_FEE = 2, LEDGER_UPGRADE_MAX_TX_SET_SIZE = 3, LEDGER_UPGRADE_BASE_RESERVE = 4, LEDGER_UPGRADE_FLAGS = 5, LEDGER_UPGRADE_CONFIG = 6, LEDGER_UPGRADE_MAX_SOROBAN_TX_SET_SIZE = 7 }; ```
